name: create_UserAgent.ID_session
description: Initializes a new, secure, interactive browser agent session for a user to accomplish a specific goal. This is the first tool to call when a user wants to start a new task.

user_identity.description: The user's unique, human-readable identity handle. For example: 'justin.UAID'.

user_goal.description: A clear, natural language description of the user's ultimate objective for this session.
